name: HIRING WINGS CONSULTANCY
description: Launched in June- 2021, We are an HR Consultancy Start-up firm with a vision of serving in various industries to meet their hiring needs and create a global network of the highly adept intelligent workforce that help a company achieve its mission-critical projects and goals. Our team is Specialized in Staffing, executing search, headhunting, manpower, and Talent Acquisition. At our consultancy, we understand that a company's most valuable asset is its people. That's why we're dedicated to providing businesses with the tools they need to recruit, retain, and develop top talent. Our team of experienced HR consultants works with you to design customized HR strategies that align with your business objectives and promote a positive workplace culture.
features: We adopt the highest ethical standards of our industry
We support workplace flexibility and encourage work/life balance.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: The Best RECRUITING Solution for your Business
ShortDescription: We empower businesses through effective HR solutions.

Highlights.name: Highly Motivated Team with Innovative solutions
Highlights.description: We love what we do and therefore come up with the best possible solutions to help you set up and fill the open positions. We are your trusted hiring partners you can count on.

Highlights.name: Build a flourishing business
Highlights.description: When connected with us, you aren’t growing your business alone. We have your back and put in our best to contribute to the growth of your entire team and organization. So, if you are looking for the right consultancy that’ll help you build the Best workforce and bring in more conversions and revenue, we are right here!

enhanced_description: HIRING WINGS CONSULTANCY, launched in June 2021 and headquartered in Pune, Maharashtra, is an HR Consultancy start-up firm. The consultancy specializes in Staffing, executive search, headhunting, manpower services, and broader Talent Acquisition. Their core mission is to empower businesses through effective HR solutions by assisting companies in recruiting, retaining, and developing top talent. They work to design customized HR strategies that align with business objectives and foster a positive workplace culture. The consultancy aims to boost Hiring Manager confidence and productivity. They are committed to honest and transparent services, adhering to the highest ethical standards, and supporting workplace flexibility and work/life balance. HIRING WINGS CONSULTANCY positions itself as a highly motivated team offering innovative solutions, acting as trusted hiring partners dedicated to contributing to the growth of their clients' entire team and organization.
competitive_advantages: Support for workplace flexibility and work/life balance
Highly motivated team with innovative solutions
roi_benefits: Achievement of mission-critical projects and goals
